fields.name: text
fields.desc: The text to display in this widget.

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: How the text should be aligned horizontally.

fields.name: softWrap
fields.desc: Whether the text should break at soft line breaks.

fields.name: overflow
fields.desc: How visual overflow should be handled.

fields.name: maxLines
fields.desc: An optional maximum number of lines for the text to span, wrapping if necessary. If the text exceeds the given number of lines, it will be truncated according to [overflow].

fields.name: locale
fields.desc: Used to select a font when the same Unicode character can be rendered differently, depending on the locale.

fields.name: selectionRegistrar
fields.desc: The [SelectionRegistrar] this rich text is subscribed to.

fields.name: selectionColor
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the selection.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of RichText
desc: Other properties are the same as Text, see it for details.

nodes.name: RichText Contains Other Components
desc: Use WidgetSpan to carry ordinary components as the content of RichText
